name: Super Highway Cleanup - DEMO
description:
Controls
- WASD/Arrow keys to move
- Space bar to roll

How to Play
Pick up every single piece of trash on the road, and bring it back to your garbage truck. You can only hold two pieces at a time, represented by the number in the bottom left.

The Story
You made a mistake that put you in front of a judge. The judge gave you a choice: prison or community service. Naturally, you chose community service, thinking you'd have to plant a couple trees or paint a school or something. When they told you you'd be picking up trash on the highway, you thought that wasn't too bad. What they failed to mention was that you'd be picking up trash during peak traffic times!

Notes
This game is a small prototype, consisting of only two levels (for now). If you'd like to see more, leave a comment or let me know on Twitter!
